cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a pretty sweet whip. AC, moonroof, all the stuff. Comes with a childseat and a child.
This is a former gypsy cab. Lots of character. It has been auctioned off at least four times by the Metro Police Dept.
